measure.name: Residential Refrigerator
measure.description: This measure adds a residential refrigerator to the building, with a schedule based on the Building America House Simulation Protocols (add reference). TODO: add the capability to do user defined schedules (monthly multiplier and weekday/weekend schedule)
measure.modeler_description: To add a residential refrigerator, select the appropriate refrigerator option from the drop down list. A user defined refrigerator can be defined based on it's rated energy use (kWh/yr)
